string.name: location_reason
string.value: In order to show you your current location information, which is only used for the display of this application and strictly confidential.

string.name: obtain_location_permission
string.value: To get current location, the permission for accessing location is required.

string.name: obtain_precise_positioning
string.value: Obtaining the current location requires obtaining precise positioning permission in order to obtain the exact location.

string.name: open_location_services
string.value: To obtain the current location, the device location service needs to be turned on.
